Adokut presents Umap - A Minimal New Tab Google extension.

It's easy to give your Chrome New Tab window a new look with Umap. By installing this extension, you can replace your current New Tab window with a sleek interface featuring unlimited exotic wallpapers.

By clicking "Add to Chrome," I accept the installation of the Umap extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing, as described in the Terms of Use(https://adokut.com/) and Privacy Policy(https://www.adokut.com/opt-out/).

Here are some features of Umap:
Download Unlimited exotic wallpapers
Minimal Date and time display
Google Maps
Accurate clock & date and time
